dmca.title: Piano Seller Tickles DMCA Ivories
dmca.body:
Dear Sirs
	
Search query: "yamaha b1 silent upright piano"
Offending site is listed at top of results page in your "Product search results for Yamaha B1 silent Upright Piano" and also on page 3: "Normals (Burton-on-Trent) Limited Yamaha Upright Pianos".

COPYRIGHT INFRINGEMENT IS AT: http://www.normans.co.uk/items/item.aspx?itemid=4014974
ORIGINAL: http://www.chrisvenables.co.uk/yamaha%20silent%20pianos.htm

There are 3 images on this page that, although originally sourced from Yamaha, have been edited and cropped by us for use on our website.

The text on the page that describes how the silent system works is a direct copy of the text on our site that we composed.

The product description of the model of piano itself, headed "The Yamaha B1 Upright Piano", is also a direct copy of the text on our site that we composed, which is found on our page:
http://www.chrisvenables.co.uk/modelspec/Yamaha%20B1%20Upright%20Piano.htm

In fact, we have further scanned pages on their website and found that all but one of their product descriptions are mostly our material. I list below the pages on their site that feature copied content, and our pages from where they have been copied:

COPYRIGHT INFRINGEMENT IS AT: http://www.normans.co.uk/Items/b1-pe?
ORIGINAL: http://www.chrisvenables.co.uk/modelspec/Yamaha%20B2%20Upright%20Piano.htm

COPYRIGHT INFRINGEMENT IS AT: http://www.normans.co.uk/Items/p114n=opdw?
ORIGINAL: http://www.chrisvenables.co.uk/modelspec/Yamaha%20P114-m%20Upright%20Piano.htm

These pages are all accessible via Google using a product specific search query.

We ask you kindly to prohibit this site as this site contains substantial material that has been copied without our consent.

I have a good faith belief that the disputed use is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law.

Under penalty of perjury, I hereby state that the above information in my notice is accurate and that I am the copyright owner and author.

Yours faithfully

[Private]
Partner
